con:testSuite.name: Operations

con:configuration.token: Server was unable to read request

con:testCase.name: Multiply
con:testCase.con:setupScript:
log.info "Multiply. Read data from file." testRunner.testCase.setPropertyValue("Counter", "0")
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) context.fileReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(groovyUtils.projectPath + "\\MultiplyData.csv"))
firstSet = context.fileReader.readLine() StringBuffer value = new StringBuffer(firstSet) value.delete(0, 9) testCase.setPropertyValue("FirstSet", value.toString())
secondSet = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(secondSet) value.delete(0, 10) testCase.setPropertyValue("SecondSet", value.toString())
results = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(results) value.delete(0, 7) testCase.setPropertyValue("Results", value.toString())

con:testSuite.con:setupScript:
//log.info "Read default data for operations."
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) context.fileReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(groovyUtils.projectPath + "\\DefaultData.csv"))
aValue = context.fileReader.readLine() StringBuffer value = new StringBuffer(aValue) value.delete(0, 2) testSuite.setPropertyValue("a", value.toString())
bValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(bValue) value.delete(0, 2) testSuite.setPropertyValue("b", value.toString())
addResult = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(addResult) value.delete(0, 10) testSuite.setPropertyValue("addResult", value.toString())
subtractResult = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(subtractResult) value.delete(0, 15) testSuite.setPropertyValue("subtructResult", value.toString())
divideResult = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(divideResult) value.delete(0, 13) testSuite.setPropertyValue("divideResult", value.toString())

con:testCase.name: Calculation
con:testCase.con:setupScript:
log.info "Formula calculation. Read data from file."
def groovyUtils = new com.eviware.soapui.support.GroovyUtils( context ) context.fileReader = new BufferedReader(new FileReader(groovyUtils.projectPath + "\\FormulaData.csv"))
aValue = context.fileReader.readLine() StringBuffer value = new StringBuffer(aValue) value.delete(0, 2) testCase.setPropertyValue("a", value.toString())
bValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(bValue) value.delete(0, 2) testCase.setPropertyValue("b", value.toString())
cValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(cValue) value.delete(0, 2) testCase.setPropertyValue("c", value.toString())
dValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(dValue) value.delete(0, 2) testCase.setPropertyValue("d", value.toString())
eValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(eValue) value.delete(0, 2) testCase.setPropertyValue("e", value.toString())
resultValue = context.fileReader.readLine() value = new StringBuffer(resultValue) value.delete(0, 7) testCase.setPropertyValue("result", value.toString())
log.info "Formula calculation. Start calculation."

con:mockOperation.name: Divide
